formatted_address: #02-127, E Hub Downtown East, 1 Pasir Ris Cl, Singapore 519599
name: Singapore Pools @ NTUC FairPrice (Downtown East)

reviews.text: That white-haired auntie’s service attitude is really terrible！Looking at her face like I owe her few millions

Bought from this Singapore pools, went there very happy but being served by an extremely rude and loud counter staff, she was just utterly unpleasant, made everything so upsetting for me. She kept rolling her eyes whilst i talk to her, I dont frequently buy thus not sure the terms of how to buy and she wasn't helpful at all, just chased all the luck away. A suggestion , This Is a place where people need luck, if you are that unhappy with your own life, stop working there spreading your negativity chasing the luck away for everyone seriously!
Movie's, Food, Entertainment, Theme Park or just trying your luck buying 4D all under one roof....

No longer inside FairPrice itself (the supermarket has undergone revamp and realignment of its merchandise layout), it's now sited in a small separate space carved out from the liquor and snacks section. Entrance is now located opposite Emi Cake store, there're 2 ATMs (POSB & OCBC) immediately outside.

Revamped and expanded outlet.
Newly organized racks.
Great sushi available.
Expect slightly longer waiting time during payment.

vicinity: #02-127, E Hub Downtown East, 1 Pasir Ris Close
